p: Approximately 350 ml of BM was aspirated from the posterior iliac crest under epidural anesthesia according to the anesthesiologist's judgment. The procedures were performed by an experienced hematologist within a qualified operating room. BM blood samples were anticoagulated with sodium heparin 5000 UI, stored in bags and shipped at controlled temperature (+ 4 °C/+ 20 °C) to the GMP-qualified facility (Cell and Gene Therapy Laboratory "Stefano Verri”, Monza, Italy).
